privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Learn how FreeFocusGames protects your privacy and handles data collection.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: FreeFocusGames is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect minimal information to provide and improve our services:
dataCollection.analytics: Usage data through Google Analytics (page views, session duration, country/region)
dataCollection.technical: Technical information (browser type, device type, IP address)
dataCollection.cookies: Cookies and similar technologies for site functionality

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site. This helps us improve our games and user experience.

cloudflare.title: Cloudflare
cloudflare.description: We use Cloudflare for content delivery and security. Cloudflare may collect certain technical information to provide these services.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.monitor: Monitor website performance and user experience
dataUse.security: Ensure website security and prevent abuse

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site usage. Most cookies are automatically deleted when you close your browser.
cookies.control: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.access: Request information about data we have collected

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using FreeFocusGames.

acceptance.content: By accessing and using FreeFocusGames, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: FreeFocusGames is a free online platform providing brain training games designed to improve cognitive abilities including memory, attention, and focus.
